properties.Deficiency_Type: Physical Deficiency, Regulatory Deficiency, Regulatory Deficiency, Regulatory Deficiency
properties.Deficiency_Description: Conduct a formal annual inspection identifying any current deficiency and submit a copy of the inspection report., Conduct necessary maintenance to manage overgrown vegetation on the southwest embankment, Ensure the dam is authorized through an upto date water Licence prior to receiving a LTO, submit an upto date as-built drawing of the reservoir/dam reflecting the recent upgrade made to the embankment
